---
id: set-white-board-user-auth
title: "SetWhiteboardUserAuth"
description: "Call this API to set a user's whiteboard permissions."
api: 
info_path: extended_services/super_board/en/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>SetWhiteboardUserAuth</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Call this API to set a user's whiteboard permissions.
- When a user leaves the room or disconnects, the user's permissions are cleared. If the user logs into the same room again and wants to use user permissions, they need to set the user permissions again.
- When the room that the user is in is destroyed, the user's permissions are also cleared.

Set the user permissions to\:

- Whiteboard can be zoomed and scrolled.
- Can create graphic elements and modify others' graphic elements.

<Note title="Note">Rate limit\: 50 requests/second (Test environment\: 1 request/second).</Note>

## Request

Empty arrays are not allowed.\n- 0\\: No permission\n- 1\\: Allow zooming the whiteboard\n- 2\\: Allow scrolling the whiteboard\n\nExample\\: ModuleAuth[]=1&ModuleAuth[]=2\n","required":true,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"number","enum":[0,1,2]}},"style":"form","explode":true}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"GraphicAuth","in":"query","description":"Graphic element operation permission set. Empty arrays are not allowed.\n- 0\\: No operation permission\n- 2\\: Allow modifying graphic elements created by others\n- 4\\: Allow erasing graphic elements created by others\n- 8\\: Allow moving graphic elements created by others\n- 16\\: Allow clearing graphic elements\n- 32\\: Allow creating graphic elements\n\nExample\\: GraphicAuth[]=32&GraphicAuth[]=2\n","required":true,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"number","enum":[0,2,4,8,16,32]}},"style":"form","explode":true}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>
